Script: サッカーを見るのが好きです
Meaning: I like to watch soccer

Script: 自転車に乗るのが嫌いです
Meaning: I don’t like riding a bicycle

Script: ピアノを弾くのが得意です
Meaning: I am good at playing piano

Script: ピアノを弾くのが上手です
Meaning: I am good at playing piano

Script: 絵を描くのが苦手です
Meaning: I am not good at drawing a picture

Script: 絵を描くのが下手です
Meaning: I am bad at drawing a picture

Script: パーティーに行くつもりです
Meaning: I intend to go to the party

Script: 寝る前に本を読みます
Meaning: I read a book before going to sleep

Script: 荷物を持ちましょうか
Meaning: Shall I carry your bag

Script: 新宿に映画を見に行きます
Meaning: I’ll go to Shinjuku to see a movie

Script: 昨日ケーキを食べすぎました
Meaning: I ate too much cake yesterday

Script: ラーメンが食べたいです
Meaning: I want to eat ramen

Script: ラーメンが食べて欲しいです
Meaning: I want you to eat ramen

Script: ゆっくり話してください
Meaning: Please speak slowly

Script: ひらがなで書いてもらえませんか
Meaning: Could I have you write it in hiragana

Script: 渋谷に行ってご飯を食べる
Meaning: I’ll go to Shibuya and eat some food

Script: 今日早く帰ってもいいですか
Meaning: May I leave early today

Script: 充電器を借りってもいいですか
Meaning: May I borrow a charger

Script: 今日本語を勉強している
Meaning: I’m studying Japanese now

Script: 埼玉に住んでいる
Meaning: I’m living in Saitama

Script: 昨日の夜８時ごろお風呂に入っていた
Meaning: I was taking a bath about 8pm last night
Concept: I was -ing (continuous action in the past)

Script: 10年前パリに住んでいた
Meaning: I used to live in Paris ten years ago
Concept: I used to (continuous state in the past)

Script: まだ昼ごはんを食べていません
Meaning: I haven’t eaten lunch yet

Script: 富士山位登ったことがあります
Meaning: I have climbed Mount Fuji
Concept: I have been to / have done

Script: 駅まではバス行ったほうがいいですよ
Meaning: It’s better to go by bus to the station

Script: 映画を見たり、買い物をしたりします
Meaning: I do things like watching movies and going shopping

Script: お金があったら、世界中旅行します
Meaning: If I had the money, I would travel around the world

Script: 駅に着いたら、電話して下さい
Meaning: When you arrive at the station, please give me a call

Script: 時間に遅れないでください
Meaning: Please don’t be late

Script: 今日は早めに帰らなきゃいけません
Meaning: I have to leave earlier today

Script: 無理しないほうがいいです
Meaning: It’s better not to work too hard

Script: 日本語で書きなくてもいいです
Meaning: You don’t have to write in Japanese

Script: いいえ、予約しなくてもいいです
Meaning: No, It’s ok to not to make a reservation

Script: 田中さんは会社にいると思います
Meaning: I think Tanaka-san is in the office

Script: 明日は雨が降るかもしれません
Meaning: It might rain tomorrow

Script: この曲は人気があるみたいです
Meaning: This song seems to be popular

Script: 部長はもう帰ったと思います
Meaning: I think the manager already went home

Script: セールは昨日までだったかもしれません
Meaning: The sale might have been until yesterday

Script: じょんさんは恣意ごとを辞めたみたいです
Meaning: John-san seems to have quit his job

Script: ギターが弾けます
Meaning: I can play the guitar

Script: まいにちれんしゅうすれば、およげるようになります
Meaning: If you practice everyday, you'll eventually be able to swim

Script: 漢字が読めるようになりました
Meaning: I became able to read kanji

Script: ここから富士山が見えます
Meaning: I can see Mount Fuji from here
Concept: Can be seen / heard (potential form - see / hear)

Script: 部長はまだ会議室にいるはずです
Meaning: The manager should still be in the meeting room

Script: 仕事が遺書がしのでレッスンを休みます
Meaning: I'll miss the lesson because  I’m busy at work

Script: これは沖縄で撮った写真です
Meaning: This is a photo taken on Okinawa

Script: JLPT　を受けるかどうかわかりません
Meaning: I don't know If I’ll take the JLPT or not
Concept: I don’t know whether or not to

Script: 近藤さんの送別会に行くかどうかまだ決めていません
Meaning: I haven’t  decided if I’ll go to Kondo-san’s farewell party
Concept: I haven’t decided whether or not to

Script: 出かける前に鍵をかけましたかどうか覚えていない
Meaning: I don't remember  whether or not I locked the door before leaving
Concept: I don’t remember whether or not

Script: 何時に来るか分からない
Meaning: I don't know what time she will come

Script: いつ帰るかまだ決めていません
Meaning: I haven’t decided yet when to go back

Script: ここまでどうやって来ましたか覚えていません
Meaning: I don’t remember how we arrived here

Script: 自分で作ってみます
Meaning: I’ll try to make it myself

Script: 予約しておきます
Meaning: I'll make the reservation (in advance)

Script: 桜が咲いています
Meaning: The cherry blossoms are booming

Script: 財布を落としてしました
Meaning: Unfortunately, I dropped my wallet

Script: タクシーに乗れば、間に合います
Meaning: You can make if if you take a taxi

Script: もっと勉強すればよかった
Meaning: I should have studied harder

Script: どうやって注文すればいいですか
Meaning: How should I order

Script: 私は友達にDVDをあげました
Meaning: I gave my friend the DVD

Script: 友達が私にお菓子をくれました
Meaning: My frend gave me  snacks

Script: 友達に映画のチケットをもらいました
Meaning: I got tickets to the movies from my friend

Script: 私は友達に英語教えてあげました
Meaning: I taught my friend English

Script: 友達が私に日本語教えてくれました
Meaning: My friend taught me Japanese

Script: 友達に宿題を手伝ってもらいました
Meaning: I had my friend help me with my homework

Script: 今週は行こうと思っています
Meaning: I am thinking of going this week

Script: 予約しようと思ったら、いっぱいでした
Meaning: When I tried to make a reservation, it was fully booked

Script: 外に行きましょうか・外に行こう
Meaning: Shall (we) go outside

Script: ポリッジが誰かに食べられた
Meaning: The porridge was eaten by somebody

Script: 先生が学生に宿題をたくさんさせた
Meaning: Teacher made students do lots of homework

Script: 私は田中さんに運転させてあげる
Meaning: I let Mr. Tanaka to drive

Script: 田中さんは私に運転させてくれる
Meaning: Mr. Tanaka let me drive

Script: 私は田中さんに運転させてもらう
Meaning: I have Mr. Tanaka to let me drive
Concept: I have/had someone let me (causative - seru / saseru)

Script: 朝ご飯は食べたくなかったのに、食べさせられた
Meaning: Despite not wanting to eat breakfast, I was made to eat it
Concept: get / got made to (causative-passive - reru / rareru + seru / saseru )
